resources.string: Enter a name for the tag
Do you really want to remove the tag?
Enter a new name for the notebook
Deleting this notebook cannot be undone

-Edit an entry by clicking on it
-Remove an entry by swiping from left to right on it
-Links have to start with http or https
-Only one link per entry is possible
-Long click on an entry with link to open it in your default browser
-The link is only opened if the entry is not edited
-Click on the microphone to insert the text you speak at the cursor position\n-To use this function, you need to allow the app to access the microphone!

-Create a new tag with the "+" in the tag menu
-Select one ore more tags in the tag menu, to show all notes with the selected tags
-Every note got a tag symbol in its menu. Clicking on it will show/hide the tags
-To assign a tag to a note click on the "+Tag"(Is hidden by default with the tags of the note)
-Edit the link, which is displayed above the WebView, by clicking on the pencil\n-Open the link in your browser by clicking on the symbol next to the pencil
-Save the attachments to your files by clicking on the download symbol
-Create a new note with the \"+\" button\n-Long click on a note to open up a context menu
-Close the current notebook in the 3 point menu at the top right\n-Long click on a notebook in the notebook menu to open up a context menu
-Moving, renaming or deleting the file removes the notebook from the notebook list

This app doesn\'t collect any personal data. Only preferences and notebooks are saved. The notebooks are containing everything you entered and all the attachments. Where you store them is up to you! But always remember: If you use external notebooks or if you export notebooks, other apps may access them!
